nodes.text: A male individual was the captain of a GR-75 medium transport which was holding survivors from the destruction of Alderaan. The Alderaanian refugee convoy was heading to Fostar Haven when they were intercepted by Captain Lindon Javes of Helix Squadron who were sent to destroy them. But Javes could not bring himself to kill the refugees and aided in their escape. The captain led the convoy to its escape when the Alliance to Restore the Republic arrived to fight off the Galactic Empire from destroying them.
